title: FS: T206 Evers (Cubs on Shirt) an Manion (S/L)
author: Frazier

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Evers (Cubs on Shirt) an Manion (S/L)
posts.post_content:
I have the following two PSA graded T-206 cards for sale:

Johnny Evers with Bat (Cubs on Shirt) in a PSA 3 VG. Back is a Piedmont 150. Card is centered 60/40 top to bottom and 55/45 side to side. $325 delivered.

George Manion (Southern League) in a PSA 2 Good. Back is an Old Mill. Card is centered approx. 50/50 side to side and 85/15 top to bottom. $100 delivered.

Payment by PayPal F/F only to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. See attached scans.

Thanks for looking.

Bill
